translated: Therefore, as long as the object-cognition apprehends itself as the aspect of the object,

original: @225a * // yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa yin pa'i phyir tshul gnyis pa yin no zhes bshad pa de srid du /
analyzed: @225a * // yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa yin pa'i phyir tshul gnyis pa yin no zhes bshad pa de srid du /
translated: it is the second mode because it is the object-cognition that has the aspect of the object.üîΩAs long as that is the case,

original: yul shes de yi shes pa yi //
analyzed: yul shes de yi shes pa yi //
translated: the cognition of that object-cognition

original: bye brag las ni tshul gnyis nyid //
analyzed: bye brag las ni tshul gnyis nyid //
translated: is the second mode due to the distinction.

original: ces bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba yin no //
translated: This is what is said.

original: de bas na gtan tshigs kyi don phyis gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na gtan tshigs kyi don phyis gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the meaning of the reason will be clarified later.

original: ci'i phyir yul gyi ngo bo sgrub pas shes pa de tshul gnyis nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang sgrub pa ma yin zhe na /üîΩde'i phyir de la 'dir blo ni //
analyzed: ci'i phyir yul gyi ngo bo sgrub pas shes pa de tshul gnyis nyid du bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang sgrub pa ma yin zhe na / de'i phyir de la 'dir blo ni //
translated: Why is the nature of the object established by the cognition, and not the form of the apprehending cognition?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúHere, the cognition is not accepted as having the form of an experience.‚Äù

original: 'ga' zhig blo ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa mi 'dod de /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig blo ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa mi 'dod de /
translated: Some do not assert that cognition has the form of an experience.

original: rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du khas mi len na blo nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du khas mi len na blo nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not accepted as having the nature of an object, it would not be cognition.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni tshad ma kun las btus pa mdzad pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni tshad ma kun las btus pa mdzad pa ston par byed do //
translated: Therefore, he says, ‚ÄúFor that very reason,‚Äù indicating the composition of the Compendium of Valid Cognition.

original: don gyi rnam pa nyid kyis rang nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bo rtogs par 'gyur bar snang ba de ltar na don du rnag snang ba yin no //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa nyid kyis rang nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bo rtogs par 'gyur bar snang ba de ltar na don du rnag snang ba yin no //
translated: When the form of the object itself is cognized as having the nature of being cognized, it appears as if the object were cognized. In that case, the object appears as if it were the cognition.

original: de ltar na don gyi rnam pa nyid bya ba nyid yin pas na bsgrub par bya ba bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na don gyi rnam pa nyid bya ba nyid yin pas na bsgrub par bya ba bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, since the form of the object itself is the action, it is explained as the object to be established.

original: don du snang ba dang rang snang ba zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: don du snang ba dang rang snang ba zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
translated: In reality, the meaning of the compound is that the object appears and is self-illuminating.

original: don du rang snang ba zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa gsungs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: don du rang snang ba zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa gsungs pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin reality, self-illuminating‚Äù is the statement of the thesis.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bu ston par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i 'bras bu ston par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúdemonstrates the effect of the proof‚Äù means that it shows the effect of the proof.

original: sbyor ba'i dus na dam bca' ba sbyor ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dus na dam bca' ba sbyor ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: At the time of the proof, the thesis is not present.

original: yul shes pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba kun las btus pa'i gzhung yin no //
analyzed: yul shes pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba kun las btus pa'i gzhung yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe cognition that is the cognition of the object‚Äù is the text of the Compendium of Principles.

original: 'di'i bshad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can gyi rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba yin te /üîΩyul gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa 'dis 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di'i bshad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can gyi rtogs pa'o zhes bya ba yin te / yul gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa 'dis 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The explanation of this is ‚Äúthe realization that has the character of apprehending the aspect of the object.‚ÄùüîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe cognition that experiences the aspect of the object‚Äù has the character of apprehending.

original: de ni yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa snang ba can zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa snang ba can zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe cognition that is illuminated and is in accordance with the object‚Äù means thatüîΩthe cognition is illuminated by the object.

original: yul dang rjes su mthun pa ste /
analyzed: yul dang rjes su mthun pa ste /
translated: In accordance with the object.

original: yul gyi rnam pas nye bar bsgyur ba nyams su myong ba'i shes pa shes pa gang la snang ba ste /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pas nye bar bsgyur ba nyams su myong ba'i shes pa shes pa gang la snang ba ste /
translated: The consciousness that experiences the transformation in accordance with the object appears in the consciousness.

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa yod pa de la de skad ces bstan to //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa yod pa de la de skad ces bstan to //
translated: That which has the aspect of the object is taught to be like that.

original: de'i bshad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don yin no zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni yul gyi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs kyi don yin no zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: The meaning of the reason is that it is because it is the object of the consciousness that has the aspect of the object.

original: yul gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la dmigs pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la dmigs pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which has the consciousness that experiences the aspect of the object as its object is called that.

original: de'i dngos po yin pa de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dngos po yin pa de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is that thing.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don dngos ston par byed pas na gtan tshigs kyi don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don dngos ston par byed pas na gtan tshigs kyi don to //
translated: The meaning of the reason is the meaning of the reason itself.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don ni dngos su 'di 'dra ba yin par rig par @225b bya ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don ni dngos su 'di 'dra ba yin par rig par @225b bya ste /
translated: The meaning of the reason should be understood to be like this.

original: rang 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pas yul gyi rnam pa nye bar bsgyur bas gzung ba nyid kyi phyir yul gyi shes pa bzung ba'i rnam pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: rang 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pas yul gyi rnam pa nye bar bsgyur bas gzung ba nyid kyi phyir yul gyi shes pa bzung ba'i rnam pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yin no //
translated: Because the object is transformed into the aspect of the object-possessor by the consciousness apprehending it, the consciousness of the object is related to the aspect of the object-possessor.

original: sbyor ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: The syllogism will be explained later.

original: rang snang ba zhes bya ba ni kun las btus pa'i gzhung yin no //
analyzed: rang snang ba zhes bya ba ni kun las btus pa'i gzhung yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúappearing as itself‚Äù is from the Compendium of Abhidharma.

original: rang nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bor snang ba yin pa de ltar na rang snang pa'o //
analyzed: rang nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bor snang ba yin pa de ltar na rang snang pa'o //
translated: It appears as the nature of the cognizer itself; thus it appears as itself.

original: de nyid ni yul gyi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa snang bar gyur pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid ni yul gyi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa snang bar gyur pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed do //
translated: This is explained by the phrase ‚Äúthe consciousness that appears as the aspect of the object‚Äù and so on.

original: 'dis kyang shes pa'i shes pa yang gzung ba'i rnam pas bsgyur pa nyid yin par gtsor bstan to //
analyzed: 'dis kyang shes pa'i shes pa yang gzung ba'i rnam pas bsgyur pa nyid yin par gtsor bstan to //
translated: This also primarily teaches that the consciousness of consciousness is transformed by the aspect of the object.

original: de lta ma yin na gal te yul gyi ngo bo kho na shes par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gal te yul gyi ngo bo kho na shes par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: If it were not so, if the nature of the object were to become consciousness,

original: rang gi ngo bo ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i kun las btus pa'i gzhung 'di ni tshul gnyis las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i kun las btus pa'i gzhung 'di ni tshul gnyis las bzlog par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This passage from the Compendium of Abhidharma, ‚Äúnot its own nature,‚Äù is to be understood in the opposite sense of the two modes.

original: de lta ma yin na gal te yul gyi ngo bo kho na 'ba' zhig yul gyi shes par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gal te yul gyi ngo bo kho na 'ba' zhig yul gyi shes par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: If that were not so, if the nature of the object alone were the object‚Äôs consciousness,

original: rang gi ngo bo ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ma yin pa'am /
translated: then it would not be its own nature.

original: nyams su myong ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas spel nas 'chad pa yin no //üîΩyul gyi ngo bo kho na shes par 'gyur ba yin gyi zhes bya ba de ni tshul gnyis las bzlog pa tsam rab tu bstan pa'i phyir smos pa yin gyi 'ga' zhig kyang yul gyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas spel nas 'chad pa yin no // yul gyi ngo bo kho na shes par 'gyur ba yin gyi zhes bya ba de ni tshul gnyis las bzlog pa tsam rab tu bstan pa'i phyir smos pa yin gyi 'ga' zhig kyang yul gyi ngo bo nyid shes pa yin par mi 'dod do //
translated: The explanation is expanded with ‚Äúexperience‚Äù and so on.üîΩ‚ÄúThe nature of the object alone is consciousness‚Äù is stated to indicate the mere opposite of the two modes, but it is not asserted that anything is the consciousness of the nature of the object.

original: yul gyi ngo bo nyid 'ba' zhig yin na rtogs pa'i ngo bor gyur pa yul bzhin du shes pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul gyi ngo bo nyid 'ba' zhig yin na rtogs pa'i ngo bor gyur pa yul bzhin du shes pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were only the nature of the object, it would follow that the nature of the object would not be consciousness, like the object itself.

original: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba ni brtsad pa'i gzhir gyur pa nyid kyis nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba ni brtsad pa'i gzhir gyur pa nyid kyis nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin terms of its own nature‚Äù is stated because it is the basis of the dispute.

original: de ltar ni shes pa rnam pa med pa yin no zhes dpyod pa pa la sogs pas rtogs so //
analyzed: de ltar ni shes pa rnam pa med pa yin no zhes dpyod pa pa la sogs pas rtogs so //
translated: The SƒÅ·πÉkhyas and others think that consciousness is devoid of aspects.

original: de'i tshe shes pa'i shes pa yang ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe shes pa'i shes pa yang ste /
translated: The response to that is that the consciousness of consciousness would also be the same.

original: yul shes pa'i shes pa yang yul shes pa'i shes pa dang bye brag med par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod pa ston pa yin no //
analyzed: yul shes pa'i shes pa yang yul shes pa'i shes pa dang bye brag med par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod pa ston pa yin no //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthe consciousness of consciousness would also be the same‚Äù presents an undesirable consequence.

original: de yang yul gyi shes pa ni nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yin gyi yul gyi rnam pa can ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de khas len pa la blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yang yul gyi shes pa ni nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid yin gyi yul gyi rnam pa can ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de khas len pa la blta bar bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that the SƒÅ·πÉkhyas accept that the consciousness of an object is of the nature of an experience but does not have the aspect of an object.

original: bye brag med par 'gyur te zhes bya ba 'di'i bshad pa ni khyad par med na zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bye brag med par 'gyur te zhes bya ba 'di'i bshad pa ni khyad par med na zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The explanation of the phrase ‚Äúwould also be the same‚Äù is ‚Äúif there were no difference.‚Äù

original: yul gyi shes pa dmigs par gyur pas 'dzin par 'dod pa'i shes pa yul gyi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes par snang ba dang bye brag med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul gyi shes pa dmigs par gyur pas 'dzin par 'dod pa'i shes pa yul gyi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes par snang ba dang bye brag med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the passage is that the consciousness of the object would be indistinguishable from the consciousness that appears as the aspect of the object, which is asserted to be the apprehender.

original: gal te nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa can 'ba' zhig yul shes pa yin pa de'i tshe rang 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa yang yul shes pa 'di nyams su myong pa'i @226a * //
analyzed: gal te nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa can 'ba' zhig yul shes pa yin pa de'i tshe rang 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa yang yul shes pa 'di nyams su myong pa'i @226a * //
translated: If the consciousness of the object were only the aspect of the experience, then the consciousness that apprehends itself would also be the consciousness of the object, since it is the aspect of the experience.

original: rnam pa can yin no zhes bya ba de tsam gyi sgo nas skye bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: rnam pa can yin no zhes bya ba de tsam gyi sgo nas skye bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: It would arise in that way, merely in terms of that.

original: yul gyi rnam pa 'di nyams su myong ba'i shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam pa 'dis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa 'di nyams su myong ba'i shes pa yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam pa 'dis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that it arises in terms of the aspect ‚ÄúThis is the consciousness that experiences the aspect of the object.‚Äù This is the condensed meaning.

original: dmigs pas bdag la med pa'i rnam pa rang 'dzin par byed pa 'khrul pa med pa la 'jog par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pas bdag la med pa'i rnam pa rang 'dzin par byed pa 'khrul pa med pa la 'jog par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The object does not establish the nondeceptive consciousness that apprehends itself in terms of the aspect of the absence of duality.

original: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir yul nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa'i yul can gyis skyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pa'i yul nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa'i shes pa gang la yod
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir yul nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa'i yul can gyis skyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pa'i yul nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa'i shes pa gang la yod
translated: In order to clarify that, he says, ‚Äúit would not be produced by a consciousness that has the aspect of the experience of the object.‚Äù

original: pa ni yul nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa'i yul can gyis skyed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: pa ni yul nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa'i yul can gyis skyed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: That consciousness which has the experience of the object such as blue, that is, which has the aspect of such an experience, would not be produced by a consciousness that has the aspect of the experience of the object.

original: yul gyi shes pas skyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yul gyi shes pas skyed par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that it would not be produced by a consciousness that has the object.

original: yul gyi shes pa ni de'i yul yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi shes pa ni de'i yul yin no //
translated: The consciousness of the object is the object of that consciousness.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis skyon sdud par byed do /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'grel pa byed pa nyid kyis skyon sdud par byed do /
translated: Therefore, etc. The author of the commentary himself summarizes the faults.

original: yul gyi shes pas shes pa yul nyams su myong ba'i rnam par bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi yul gyi shes pa de yang yul gyi rnam pa dang bral ba nyid yin na yul sngon po la sogs pa nyams su myong
analyzed: yul gyi shes pas shes pa yul nyams su myong ba'i rnam par bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi yul gyi shes pa de yang yul gyi rnam pa dang bral ba nyid yin na yul sngon po la sogs pa nyams su myong
translated: Not only is consciousness not generated in the aspect of the experience of the object, but also if the object‚Äôs consciousness is devoid of the aspect of the object, then the object blue and so on is not experienced.

original: ba nyid 'grub par mi 'gyur te don dang 'dra ba med par yul nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ba nyid 'grub par mi 'gyur te don dang 'dra ba med par yul nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Not only is consciousness not generated in the aspect of the experience of the object, but also if the consciousness of the object is devoid of the aspect of the object, then the experience of the object, such as blue, would not be established, because without being like the object, the object would not be experienced.

original: 'di ltar yul shes pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: 'di ltar yul shes pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid gsal bar byed do //
translated: He clarifies that point with ‚ÄúIn that case, the consciousness of the object . . . ‚Äù and so on.

original: de shes pa ste zhes bya ba ni yul shes pa 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa'o //
analyzed: de shes pa ste zhes bya ba ni yul shes pa 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat consciousness‚Äù refers to the consciousness that apprehends the consciousness of the object.

original: yul gyi rnam pa shes pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can du zhes bya ba ni yul gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa shes pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can du zhes bya ba ni yul gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving the character of apprehending the aspect of the object‚Äù means that it is said to have the character of apprehending the consciousness that experiences the aspect of the object.

original: de ltar na dmigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na dmigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, a consciousness that is in accordance with the object arises.üîΩIf it were not so,

original: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni yul gyi shes pa yul gyi rnam pa dang bral ba nyid yin par 'dod na shes pa'i shes pas yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyis yul gyi rnam pa can du yul gyi shes pa 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na zhes bya ba ni yul gyi shes pa yul gyi rnam pa dang bral ba nyid yin par 'dod na shes pa'i shes pas yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyis yul gyi rnam pa can du yul gyi shes pa 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: if you assert that the consciousness of the object is devoid of the aspect of the object, then the consciousness of consciousness would not apprehend the consciousness of the object as having the aspect of the object, by means of the aspect of the object.

original: skad kyi dbyings ni don du ma can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad kyi dbyings ni don du ma can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the verbal root j√±ƒÅ has many meanings.

original: yul gyi rnam pa ma yin pa'i gzung ba la yul gyi rnam pa nyid du 'dzin pa rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa ma yin pa'i gzung ba la yul gyi rnam pa nyid du 'dzin pa rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable to apprehend the object that is not the aspect of the object as the aspect of the object.

original: yang na yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyis yul gyi shes pa bye brag tu mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: yang na yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyis yul gyi shes pa bye brag tu mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: Or else, the consciousness of the object would not be distinguished by means of the aspect of the object.

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pas yul gyi shes pa khyad par du gyur pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha dad pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pas yul gyi shes pa khyad par du gyur pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The consciousness of the object would not be distinguished by the aspect of the object that is different from the aspect of the object that is apprehended. This is the meaning.

original: sngon po la sogs @226b pa nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo nyid de de yul gyi shes par mi 'gyur te don dang 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs @226b pa nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo nyid de de yul gyi shes par mi 'gyur te don dang 'dra ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of the experience of blue, etc., would not be the cognition of the object because it would not resemble the object.

original: des ni sngar bshad pa'i don rjes su bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni sngar bshad pa'i don rjes su bstan pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation of the meaning stated previously.

original: thal ba bzlog pa bstan pa'i phyir 'dzin pa dang 'gyur ba yang yin te /
analyzed: thal ba bzlog pa bstan pa'i phyir 'dzin pa dang 'gyur ba yang yin te /
translated: In order to demonstrate the reversal of the absurd consequence, he says, ‚ÄúIt would also be the apprehender and the transformation.‚Äù

original: de ji skad du bshad pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa zhes bya ba ni thal ba bzlog pa yin no //
analyzed: de ji skad du bshad pa'i rang bzhin can yin pa zhes bya ba ni thal ba bzlog pa yin no //
translated: The reversal of the absurd consequence is stated in the words, ‚ÄúIt would have the nature described above.‚Äù

original: yul gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du shes pa'i shes pa 'dzin par byed pa dang / nyams su myong ba'i shes par 'gyur ba de ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rang bzhin yang yin pa de ltar na yul gyi shes pa de ni sngon po la sogs pa'i nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du shes pa'i shes pa 'dzin par byed pa dang / nyams su myong ba'i shes par 'gyur ba de ni ji skad du bshad pa'i rang bzhin yang yin pa de ltar na yul gyi shes pa de ni sngon po la sogs pa'i nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition that cognizes the form of the object as cognition itself is the apprehender, and the cognition that becomes the experience is the transformation. Thus, that cognition of the object would have the nature described above, and it would be the nature of the experience of blue, etc.

original: de'i phyir de la yang ste nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la yul gyi rnam pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de la yang ste nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la yul gyi rnam pa yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it would also have the form of the object in the experience of cognition.

original: cha gnyis dmigs pa can gyi zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i shes pa yul gyi rnam pas bsgyur ba nyams su myong ba 'di yin no zhes 'jug pa na yul gyi shes pa'i gzung ba'i cha dang 'dzin pa'i cha la dmigs pa yin gyi 'dzin pa'i cha 'ba'
analyzed: cha gnyis dmigs pa can gyi zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i shes pa yul gyi rnam pas bsgyur ba nyams su myong ba 'di yin no zhes 'jug pa na yul gyi shes pa'i gzung ba'i cha dang 'dzin pa'i cha la dmigs pa yin gyi 'dzin pa'i cha 'ba'
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat which is focused on the two parts‚Äù means that when one experiences the transformation of consciousness into the form of an object, one focuses on the apprehended part and the apprehending part of the consciousness that perceives the object.

original: zhig la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: zhig la ni ma yin no //
translated: One does not focus on the apprehending part alone.

original: 'di ni byed pa po'i gsum pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni byed pa po'i gsum pa yin no //
translated: This is the third type of agent.

original: rnam pa gcig las khyad par can //üîΩzhes bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gsum pa yin no //üîΩnyams su myong ba'i rnam pa gcig las khyad par du gyur pa ni yul gyi rnam pa yin te zhes bya ba ni re zhig yul shes pa'i nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa gcig yin par 'dod pa de bzung nas de las gzhan pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa'i
analyzed: rnam pa gcig las khyad par can // zhes bya ba ni de lta bur gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gsum pa yin no // nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa gcig las khyad par du gyur pa ni yul gyi rnam pa yin te zhes bya ba ni re zhig yul shes pa'i nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa gcig yin par 'dod pa de bzung nas de las gzhan pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa'i
translated: The fourth type is that which is distinguished from the single aspect.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthat which is distinguished from the single aspect‚Äù means that the third type of agent is characterized by the fact that it is distinguished from the single aspect of experience.üîΩThe phrase ‚Äúthe aspect of the object‚Äù means that the aspect of the object is distinguished from the single aspect of experience of the consciousness that perceives the object.

original: mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yin te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúthat which is characterized by the aspect of the object‚Äù means that the aspect of the object is connected to the aspect of the object that is distinguished from the single aspect of experience.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i nyams su myong ba 'di yin no zhes de ltar yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i nyams su myong ba 'di yin no zhes de ltar yongs su gcod pa'i phyir ro /
translated: Because it is the experience of blue and so on that is ascertained in that way.üîΩ

original: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel bshad /üîΩbam po lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa /
analyzed: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel bshad / bam po lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa /
translated: Because it is the determining factor that says, ‚ÄúThis is the experience of blue, etc.‚Äù

original: de la 'dir nyams su myong ba'i shes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa'i nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa smos pa'o //
analyzed: de la 'dir nyams su myong ba'i shes pa ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam yin te zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa'i nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa smos pa'o //
translated: Here, the consciousness that experiences is merely an illustration.

original: dpyod pa'i shes pa yang zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa yang ngo //
analyzed: dpyod pa'i shes pa yang zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa yang ngo //
translated: The consciousness that analyzes is also a conceptual consciousness.

original: de'i shes pas zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa'i shes pa 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pas so //
analyzed: de'i shes pas zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa'i shes pa 'dzin par byed pa'i shes pas so //
translated: The consciousness of that is the consciousness that apprehends the consciousness that analyzes.

original: ji ltar bsams pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bsams pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba dpyod pa'i shes pa nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir nyams su myong ba zhes brjod do
analyzed: ji ltar bsams pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bsams pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba dpyod pa'i shes pa nyid rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir nyams su myong ba zhes brjod do
translated: ‚ÄúLike the experience of the aspect of the object as it was imagined‚Äù means that the very cognition that analyzes the experience of the aspect of the object as it was imagined has the nature of realization, and therefore it is called ‚Äúexperience.‚Äù

original: // 'dra ba ni ji ltar bsams pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid du snang ba @227a * //
analyzed: // 'dra ba ni ji ltar bsams pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid du snang ba @227a * //
translated: ‚ÄúLike‚Äù means that it appears as if it has the characteristic of the experience of the aspect of the object as it was imagined.

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: de ltar na dpyod pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa dpyod pa'i shes pa yul du gyur pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas na 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na dpyod pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa dpyod pa'i shes pa yul du gyur pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur bas na 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the cognition that analyzes the apprehending cognition becomes like the object of the analyzing cognition, and therefore it is ‚Äúlike.‚Äù

original: gzhan dag ni rang gi ngo bo zhes 'don par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni rang gi ngo bo zhes 'don par byed de /
translated: Others read ‚Äúits own nature.‚Äù

original: de la yang bsams pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i rang gi ngo bor skyes pa de nyid la de'i rang gi ngo bo yin par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la yang bsams pa'i don gyi rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i rang gi ngo bor skyes pa de nyid la de'i rang gi ngo bo yin par blta bar bya'o //
translated: In that case, the very arising of the experience of the aspect of the object as it was imagined as its own nature should be regarded as its own nature.

original: rang gi yul can gyi zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa'i shes pa'i yul can gyi'o //
analyzed: rang gi yul can gyi zhes bya ba ni dpyod pa'i shes pa'i yul can gyi'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving its own object‚Äù means having the object of the consciousness that analyzes.

original: de bas na dpyod pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa yang dpyad pa'i rnam pa dang rjes su 'brel pa nyid kyis bye brag tu gyur pa de ltar na dpyod pa'i shes pa yang yul gyi rnam pa can yin no ;
analyzed: de bas na dpyod pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa yang dpyad pa'i rnam pa dang rjes su 'brel pa nyid kyis bye brag tu gyur pa de ltar na dpyod pa'i shes pa yang yul gyi rnam pa can yin no ;
translated: Therefore, the consciousness that apprehends the consciousness that analyzes is also distinguished by being connected with the aspect of the analysis. Thus, the consciousness that analyzes also has the aspect of an object.

original: / shes pa 'di 'dra ba'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la don dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dis gzung ba'i rnam pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: / shes pa 'di 'dra ba'i don dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la don dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dis gzung ba'i rnam pa ston par byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúThe object of such a consciousness‚Äù means that the object is endowed with the aspect of the object.

original: shes pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ston par byed do //
analyzed: shes pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ston par byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúConsciousness‚Äù indicates the aspect of the subject.

original: de ltar na nga'i bsam pa 'di 'dra bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam pa 'di 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: de ltar na nga'i bsam pa 'di 'dra bar gyur to zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam pa 'di 'dra ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúI thought in such a way‚Äù means ‚ÄúI had such an aspect of an object.‚Äù

original: 'dis ni gzung ba'i rnam pa brjod do //
analyzed: 'dis ni gzung ba'i rnam pa brjod do //
translated: This indicates the aspect of the object.

original: bsam pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa brjod do //
analyzed: bsam pa zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa brjod do //
translated: ‚ÄúThought‚Äù indicates the aspect of the subject.

original: gang gi phyir 'di ltar yul gyi rnam pa can yul gyi shes pa de'i shes pas dmigs par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'di ltar yul gyi rnam pa can yul gyi shes pa de'i shes pas dmigs par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because it is like this: the cognition of the object, which has the aspect of the object, is observed by the cognition of that.

original: de'i shes pas yul gyi shes pa 'dzin par byed pas dmigs shing 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i shes pas yul gyi shes pa 'dzin par byed pas dmigs shing 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition of that observes and apprehends the cognition of the object, because it apprehends the cognition of that.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What is it?

original: yul gyi shes pa dmigs par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: yul gyi shes pa dmigs par 'dod pa'o //
translated: It is asserted that the cognition of the object is observed.

original: ci lta bur gyur pa zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci lta bur gyur pa zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of cognition is it?

original: yul gyi rnam pa can te /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa can te /
translated: It has the aspect of the object.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pas nye bar bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pas nye bar bsgyur ba'o //
translated: It is modified by the aspect of blue, etc.

original: de'i phyir de yul gyi rnam pa can yin no zhes bya ba ni yul gyi shes pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de yul gyi rnam pa can yin no zhes bya ba ni yul gyi shes pa'o //
translated: Therefore, it is said that it has the aspect of the object, referring to the cognition of the object.

original: de'i rnam pa can la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs nyid sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can la dmigs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs nyid sgrub par byed do //
translated: The statement beginning with ‚Äúit has the aspect of that‚Äù establishes the reason as an effect.

original: de ltar na de'i rnam pa can la dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs kyi don yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na de'i rnam pa can la dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs kyi don yin no //
translated: Thus, ‚Äúbecause it has the aspect of that‚Äù is the meaning of the reason.

original: de'i rnam pa can la dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gzhag pa 'di ni rtags su gyur ba don de'i rnam pa can gyi rgyu mtshan can nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can la dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gzhag pa 'di ni rtags su gyur ba don de'i rnam pa can gyi rgyu mtshan can nyid yin te /
translated: This is the presentation of the reason that is based on the evidence of the aspect of that object.

original: don la yod pa'i rnam pas de rnam par gzhag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don la yod pa'i rnam pas de rnam par gzhag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is presented by the aspect that exists in the object.

original: de nyid ni don de'i rnam pa can gyi rgyu can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos te /
analyzed: de nyid ni don de'i rnam pa can gyi rgyu can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes smos te /
translated: This is because it is based on the evidence of the aspect of that object.

original: don gyi rnam pa rgyur gyur pa bsgrub par bya ba de la ji skad du bshad pa'i phyogs kyi chos 'di ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa rgyur gyur pa bsgrub par bya ba de la ji skad du bshad pa'i phyogs kyi chos 'di ni 'bras bu'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: This property of the subject that has been explained is a reason based on effect when the aspect of the object that is the cause is the probandum.üîΩAt other times, it is a reason based on nature.

original: gzhan gyi tshe ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba ni gal te ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du @227b mi 'dod pa de'i tshe rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so zhes bya ba ni gal te ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du @227b mi 'dod pa de'i tshe rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs nyid yin te /
translated: If one does not accept cause and effect as they have been explained, then it is a reason based on nature.

original: de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pas dmigs pa ltar na de'i rnam pa can nyid du rnam par gzhag pa de ni de tsam gyi rgyu can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pas dmigs pa ltar na de'i rnam pa can nyid du rnam par gzhag pa de ni de tsam gyi rgyu can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is the case that the object is observed by a consciousness that has the aspect of that object, then it is posited as having the aspect of that object, because it is the cause of that.

original: ci'i phyir de ltar yang 'gyur ba yin zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dri ba 'god pas bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma bstan pas gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa nyid sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar yang 'gyur ba yin zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'dri ba 'god pas bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma bstan pas gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa nyid sgrub par byed do //
translated: Why does it become like that? The author of the Compendium of Valid Cognition raises this question and so on. When the opponent is refuted, the author teaches a valid cognition that contradicts the opponent‚Äôs position, and thereby establishes the pervasion of the reason.

original: de'i tshe de mi 'dod par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe de mi 'dod par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: At that time, the opponent will not accept this. In order to teach this, the author of the Compendium of Valid Cognition says,

original: shes pa'i phyi ma phyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tshad ma kun las btus pa mdzad pas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa'i phyi ma phyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tshad ma kun las btus pa mdzad pas bstan pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe subsequent consciousnesses and so on.‚Äù

original: shes pa phyi ma phyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thal ba'i gzhung yin te /
analyzed: shes pa phyi ma phyi ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thal ba'i gzhung yin te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe subsequent consciousnesses and so on‚Äù is the root text of the reductio.üîΩIf this consciousness, which is devoid of the aspect of the object, were the consciousness of the object,

original: gal te yul gyi rnam pa dang bral ba 'di yul gyi shes pa yin par 'gyur ba 'di'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te yul gyi rnam pa dang bral ba 'di yul gyi shes pa yin par 'gyur ba 'di'i tshe /
translated: then,

original: shes pa'i shes pa yul shes pas bye brag tu gyur pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon 'di 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar ma zad kyi /
analyzed: shes pa'i shes pa yul shes pas bye brag tu gyur pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i skyon 'di 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar ma zad kyi /
translated: This fault alone is not the only one,

original: 'on kyang skyon gzhan 'di yang yod pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang skyon gzhan 'di yang yod pa yin te /
translated: but there is also another fault.

original: shes pa phyi ma phyi ma skyes par gyur pa yul snga ma bskal par snang ba can du mi 'gyur zhing thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa phyi ma phyi ma skyes par gyur pa yul snga ma bskal par snang ba can du mi 'gyur zhing thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The later and later cognitions that arise would not have the earlier and earlier objects as their object, and would not obtain them.

original: de nyid ni phyi ma phyi ma ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni phyi ma phyi ma ste /
translated: That itself is later and later.

original: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la de'i shes pa la sogs pa phyi ma skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la de'i shes pa la sogs pa phyi ma skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition of experience would not give rise to the later cognition of that, etc.üîΩHow is that?

original: ci ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: ci ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsal bar byed do //
translated: He clarifies that with ‚Äúetc.‚Äù

original: phyi ma phyi ma ste zhes bya ba ni bshad par bya ba'i gzhung nye bar 'god pa'o //
analyzed: phyi ma phyi ma ste zhes bya ba ni bshad par bya ba'i gzhung nye bar 'god pa'o //
translated: Later and later means setting forth the text to be explained.

original: 'di'i bshad pa ni nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la de'i shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di'i bshad pa ni nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la de'i shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
translated: The explanation of that is ‚ÄúThe cognition of experience would not give rise to the cognition of that, etc.‚Äù

original: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la de'i shes pa zhes bdun pa'i bsdu ba yin gyi 'di zlas dbye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa la de'i shes pa zhes bdun pa'i bsdu ba yin gyi 'di zlas dbye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: The seventh case is used, but this is not aüîΩdistinction by way of a pair.üîΩThis is because the consciousness that experiences is not asserted to be the

original: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa ni phyi ma nyid du brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa ni phyi ma nyid du brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: latter.

original: shes pa'i shes pa phyi ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa'i shes pa phyi ma yin no //
translated: The consciousness of consciousness is the latter.

original: shes pa snga ma'i yul zhes bya ba ni shes pa dang po 'byung pa'i yul sngon po la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa snga ma'i yul zhes bya ba ni shes pa dang po 'byung pa'i yul sngon po la sogs pa ni /
translated: The object of the former consciousness is the blue, etc., that is the object of the first arising consciousness.

original: shes pa phyi ma la ltos nas bskal pa la'o //üîΩphyi ma phyi ma 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bskal pa'i yul la cha'i rjes su 'brang ba can du mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to ;
analyzed: shes pa phyi ma la ltos nas bskal pa la'o // phyi ma phyi ma 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bskal pa'i yul la cha'i rjes su 'brang ba can du mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to ;
translated: In relation to the latter consciousness, it is distant.üîΩIt would not grasp the latter. This means that it would not follow the parts of the distant object.

original: / bskal pa'i yul la de 'dzin par 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: / bskal pa'i yul la de 'dzin par 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not asserted that it grasps the distant object,

original: de dag ni de ma thag pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag ni de ma thag pa'i shes pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the object of the immediately preceding consciousness.

original: de'i yul nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i kun las btus pa'i gzung de'i bshad pa ni don snga ma de ni shes pa phyi ma phyi ma'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i yul nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i kun las btus pa'i gzung de'i bshad pa ni don snga ma de ni shes pa phyi ma phyi ma'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The explanation of that passage from the Compendium of Abhidharma is: ‚ÄúBecause that former object is not the object of the latter consciousness.‚Äù

original: de bas na @228a * //
analyzed: de bas na @228a * //
translated: Therefore,

original: phyi rol gyi yul gyi stobs kyis shes pa'i shes pa la bskal pa'i yul snang ba ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi yul gyi stobs kyis shes pa'i shes pa la bskal pa'i yul snang ba ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: it is the intention that the object does not appear to the consciousness of knowledge by the power of an external object.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thal ba bzlog pa ston par byed pa yin no //üîΩde bas na yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa yin par 'dod par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thal ba bzlog pa ston par byed pa yin no // de bas na yul gyi rnam pa can gyi yul shes pa yin par 'dod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, etc. shows the reversal of the absurd consequence.üîΩTherefore, it should be accepted that the object of consciousness has the aspect of the object.

original: gang la dmigs par byed pa'i shes pa dag la snga ma bskal pa'i yul snang ba yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: gang la dmigs par byed pa'i shes pa dag la snga ma bskal pa'i yul snang ba yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The intention is that the object appears to the consciousness that observes it.

original: yul gyi shes pa las byung ba'i yul gyi rnam pa'i stobs nyid kyis shes pa'i shes pa bskal pa'i yul du snang bar rig pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi shes pa las byung ba'i yul gyi rnam pa'i stobs nyid kyis shes pa'i shes pa bskal pa'i yul du snang bar rig pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: The cognition of the object is the cognition of cognition, appearing as the object, by the power of the form of the object alone, not by any other means.

original: rnam pa re res lhag pa zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa nyid gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa re res lhag pa zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa nyid gsal bar byed do //
translated: ‚ÄúBy each form‚Äù makes it clear that it is immediate.

original: thal ba bzlog pa bstan to zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar yul snga ma zhes bya ba las brtsams nas bzlog pa ston pa yin no //
analyzed: thal ba bzlog pa bstan to zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar yul snga ma zhes bya ba las brtsams nas bzlog pa ston pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe reversal of the reductio is shown‚Äù means that the reversal is shown beginning with ‚ÄúIf the former object . . . ‚Äù

original: bum pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa'i shes pas zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gnag yin pa de dmigs par byed pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bum pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa'i shes pas zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i rnam pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gnag yin pa de dmigs par byed pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúThe cognition of the cognition that experiences the pot‚Äù means that the cognition that experiences the form of the pot is the object.

original: bum pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa zhes brjod pas shes pa dang pos bum pa'i rnam pa gcig gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to //
analyzed: bum pa nyams su myong ba'i shes pa zhes brjod pas shes pa dang pos bum pa'i rnam pa gcig gzung ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan to //
translated: By saying ‚Äúthe cognition that experiences the pot,‚Äù it is shown that the first cognition apprehends the form of the pot, and so on.

original: bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The cognition that has the aspect of a pot is known.

original: bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi zhes rtogs par 'gyur zhing shes pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bum pa'i rnam pa can gyi zhes rtogs par 'gyur zhing shes pa yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition that has the aspect of a pot is known and is a cognition.

original: de bas na shes pa dang po'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de dag shes pa gnyis pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa yin par 'dod pa de ltar na dang po'i shes pa las shes pa gnyis pa rnam pa gcig gis lhag pa yin no
analyzed: de bas na shes pa dang po'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de dag shes pa gnyis pa'i gzung ba'i rnam pa yin par 'dod pa de ltar na dang po'i shes pa las shes pa gnyis pa rnam pa gcig gis lhag pa yin no
translated: Therefore, if the aspects of the object and subject of the first cognition are asserted to be the object aspect of the second cognition, then the second cognition is one aspect more than the first cognition.

original: // de shes pa'i shes pas bum pa nyams su myong ba de'i shes pa gang yin pa de'i shes pa ste gsum pas so //
analyzed: // de shes pa'i shes pas bum pa nyams su myong ba de'i shes pa gang yin pa de'i shes pa ste gsum pas so //
translated: The cognition of that cognition is the cognition of whatever is the cognition of the experience of the pot, that is, the third cognition.

original: bum pa'i shes pa'i shes pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de'i shes par gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: bum pa'i shes pa'i shes pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bum pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de'i shes par gyur pa yin no //
translated: The cognition of the cognition of the pot is the cognition of whatever is the cognition of the pot.

original: de bas na bum pa'i rnam pa dang bum pa'i rnam pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang / bum pa'i shes pa shes pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: de bas na bum pa'i rnam pa dang bum pa'i rnam pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang / bum pa'i shes pa shes pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: Therefore, the aspect of the pot, the aspect of the consciousness of the pot, and the aspect of the consciousness of the consciousness of the pot

original: gsum po de dag ni shes pa gsum pa'i gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsum po de dag ni shes pa gsum pa'i gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: are the three objects of the third consciousness.

original: de nyid ni bum pa'i rnam pa dang bcas par bum pa'i shes pa'i shes pa rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de nyid ni bum pa'i rnam pa dang bcas par bum pa'i shes pa'i shes pa rtogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is just that, together with the aspect of the pot, the consciousness of the pot is cognized.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang zhes bya ba ni shes pa bzhi pa la sogs pa la yang rnam pa re res lhag pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang zhes bya ba ni shes pa bzhi pa la sogs pa la yang rnam pa re res lhag pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: So too, in the others means that in the fourth consciousness and so on, the excess should be understood as being due to each additional aspect.

original: de @228b bas na rnam pa gang dang gang gis shes pa phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa snga ma snga ma 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam pa des de dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni nges pa yin no //
analyzed: de @228b bas na rnam pa gang dang gang gis shes pa phyi ma phyi ma'i shes pa snga ma snga ma 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam pa des de dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni nges pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is certain that whatever aspect of the later consciousness apprehends the earlier consciousness, it possesses that aspect.

original: de lta ma yin na de lta bu'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de lta bu'i ngo bo ma yin pa'i shes pa skye bar 'gyur /
translated: Otherwise, a consciousness of a different nature would arise.

original: de ltar na bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma mthong ba'i phyir khyab pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na bzlog na gnod pa can gyi tshad ma mthong ba'i phyir khyab pa grub pa yin no //
translated: Thus, since a valid cognition that contradicts it is seen, the pervasion is established.

original: bsams pa 'di nyid kyi mdo mdzad pas gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa bstan to zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
analyzed: bsams pa 'di nyid kyi mdo mdzad pas gtan tshigs kyi khyab pa bstan to zhes bya ba khong nas dbyung ngo //
translated: The author of the s≈´tra demonstrates the pervasion of the reason by this very thought.

original: shes pa gnyis pa de ni yul shes pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni'o //
analyzed: shes pa gnyis pa de ni yul shes pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni'o //
translated: The second cognition is the cognition that apprehends the cognition of the object.

original: don gyi ngo bos zhes bya ba ni gzung ba nyid kyis so //
analyzed: don gyi ngo bos zhes bya ba ni gzung ba nyid kyis so //
translated: By the nature of the object means by the apprehended itself.

original: de ltar na yul shes pa la yod pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gnyis dag kyang shes pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa'i gzung ba'i rnam par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar na yul shes pa la yod pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa gnyis dag kyang shes pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa'i gzung ba'i rnam par 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, the two aspects of the apprehended and apprehender that exist in the cognition of the object become the aspect of the apprehended of the cognition that apprehends the cognition.

original: de la de dag gzung ba nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la de dag gzung ba nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they appear as the apprehended in that cognition.

original: de'i sgo nas 'ongs pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs par gyur pa yul shes pa'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sgo nas 'ongs pa zhes bya ba ni dmigs par gyur pa yul shes pa'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'o //
translated: Having come through that means having come through the object of observation, the cognition of the object.

original: yul du snang ba dang rang snang ba'i mtshan nyid can dag ni zhes bya ba na gzung pa dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can dag go //
analyzed: yul du snang ba dang rang snang ba'i mtshan nyid can dag ni zhes bya ba na gzung pa dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can dag go //
translated: ‚ÄúThe object-possessor, which has the characteristic of appearing as an object and self-appearance, ‚Äù means that it has the characteristic of the aspect of the object and subject.

original: yul nyid du ste gzung ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: yul nyid du ste gzung ba nyid du'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAs an object‚Äù means as the object.

original: don gyi ngo bos zhes bya ba 'di'i 'grel pa yin no //
analyzed: don gyi ngo bos zhes bya ba 'di'i 'grel pa yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the entity of the object‚Äù is the commentary on this.

original: gsum pas so zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa'o //üîΩde ltar na yul gyi rnam pa can gyi shes par snang ba 'di shes pa gsum par yul shes pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa gzung par bya ba yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsum pas so zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa'o // de ltar na yul gyi rnam pa can gyi shes par snang ba 'di shes pa gsum par yul shes pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can gyi shes pa gzung par bya ba yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the third‚Äù means the consciousness that has the mode of apprehending the consciousness that is the object.üîΩThus, this appearance as a consciousness that has the aspect of the object is the third consciousness, which is the consciousness that has the mode of apprehending the consciousness that is the object.

original: de la yul gyi rnam pa can gyi shes par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la yul gyi rnam pa can gyi shes par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang rjes su 'brel pa yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúThe appearance as a consciousness that has the aspect of the object‚Äù indicates the determination of the aspect of the apprehender.

original: shes pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni rang snang ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: shes pa zhes bya ba 'dis ni rang snang ba nyid yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúConsciousness‚Äù indicates that it is self-appearance.

original: gal te yul gyi rnam pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan gyi bsam pa'i dogs pa bsu ba yin no //
analyzed: gal te yul gyi rnam pa can zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan gyi bsam pa'i dogs pa bsu ba yin no //
translated: is anticipating an objection from the other party.üîΩIf you say that the person is said to have the aspect because of the object,

original: skyes bu don des rnam pa dang ldan par sre bar byed pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni don rgyur gyur pa'i rnam pa des rnam pa dang ldan par sre bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu don des rnam pa dang ldan par sre bar byed pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni don rgyur gyur pa'i rnam pa des rnam pa dang ldan par sre bar byed pa yin te /
translated: the meaning is that the aspect that is the cause of the object is said to be the aspect of the object,

original: shes pa rnam pa med pa yin na yang rnam pa dang ldan par 'dzin par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa rnam pa med pa yin na yang rnam pa dang ldan par 'dzin par byed ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: even though consciousness is without an aspect, it is said to apprehend an aspect.üîΩThe lamp is the attention,

original: sgron ma yid byed ces bya ba ni snang ba dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen der te dran par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sgron ma yid byed ces bya ba ni snang ba dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen der te dran par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: the immediately preceding condition that is similar to the light. It is memory, that is, it is the meaning of memory.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid 'chad par byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid 'chad par byed do //
translated: He explains that very point with how, etc.üîΩWithout contact with the object,

original: yul la nye bar sbyong ba la reg pa med par zhes bya ba ni yul la nye bar sbyor ba rnam par shes pa la rang gi rnam pa 'jog pa de la reg pa med @229a * //
analyzed: yul la nye bar sbyong ba la reg pa med par zhes bya ba ni yul la nye bar sbyor ba rnam par shes pa la rang gi rnam pa 'jog pa de la reg pa med @229a * //
translated: means that the consciousness that is the contact with the object does not place its own aspect in that object.

original: bar te / rnam pa 'jog par byed pa med pa'i shes pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bar te / rnam pa 'jog par byed pa med pa'i shes pas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: In the middle, i.e., by a cognition that is devoid of an image.

original: de ltar na shes pa rnam pa med pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: de ltar na shes pa rnam pa med pa nyid yin na /
translated: Thus, if cognition is devoid of an image,

original: yul yang rnam pa 'jog par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul yang rnam pa 'jog par byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the object also does not posit an image.

original: de lta yin na yang yul dang snang ba la sogs pa rgyu nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de lta yin na yang yul dang snang ba la sogs pa rgyu nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Even if that is so, the object, the appearance, etc., are not the cause.

original: nyams su myong bar nges pa'i rnam par shes pa la rgyu'i ngo bo gang la yod pa de ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'i ngo bor gyur pa can no //
analyzed: nyams su myong bar nges pa'i rnam par shes pa la rgyu'i ngo bo gang la yod pa de ni nyams su myong ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'i ngo bor gyur pa can no //
translated: That which has the nature of a cause in the cognition that is ascertained as experience is the one that has the nature of the cause of the cognition of experience.

original: don gyi rnam par zhen pa can gyi shes pa las zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: don gyi rnam par zhen pa can gyi shes pa las zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The cognition that is attached to the image of the object, i.e.,

original: don gyi rnam pa med pa phyis 'byung ba'i shes pas zhen cing sgro 'dogs pa shes pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o ;
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa med pa phyis 'byung ba'i shes pas zhen cing sgro 'dogs pa shes pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o ;
translated: the cognition that is attached to and superimposes the subsequent cognition that is devoid of the image of the object, is the one that has that.

original: / yang na don gyi rnam par zhen pa 'khrul pas sbyar ba zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: / yang na don gyi rnam par zhen pa 'khrul pas sbyar ba zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: Or else, the compound should be analyzed as ‚Äúcomposed by one who is confused by the adherence to the reality of objects.‚Äù

original: dang po nyams su myong ba'i shes pa ni mig la sogs pa'i yul la'o //
analyzed: dang po nyams su myong ba'i shes pa ni mig la sogs pa'i yul la'o //
translated: The first experience is in the object of the eye, etc.

original: yul dang nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa dag gnyis med dngos yin na zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yul dang nyams su myong ba'i rnam pa dag gnyis med dngos yin na zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: If the object and the experience are nondual entities, i.e., the object of knowledge and the knowing subject,

original: gal te de nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo nyid 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gal te de nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo nyid 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: if it is the experience of that alone, i.e., of the object of knowledge alone,

original: 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba dang po 'dzin par byed ba'o //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa zhes bya ba ni nyams su myong ba dang po 'dzin par byed ba'o //
translated: the apprehending subject, i.e., the first experience,

original: nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: would be the same as the experience itself, i.e., the object of knowledge.

original: rang snang ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang snang ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It would be the same as the object of knowledge, i.e., it would be the object of knowledge itself.

original: de ltar na dang po'i shes pa rnam pa med pa yin na de bzhin du phyis kyi yang yin na phyis rgas pa'i tshul thob pa ma yin no zhes dgongs so //
analyzed: de ltar na dang po'i shes pa rnam pa med pa yin na de bzhin du phyis kyi yang yin na phyis rgas pa'i tshul thob pa ma yin no zhes dgongs so //
translated: Thus, if the first consciousness is without aspect, then the later ones would not be in the same condition as the later ones when one is old.

original: yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa der snang bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i shes pa'i snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni yul dang rjes su mthun pa'i nyams su myong ba'i shes pa gang yin pa der snang bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is not the appearance of a consciousness that conforms with the object means that it would not appear as that which is the experience that conforms with the object.

original: nyams su myong ba la yod pa'i shes pa la yod pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang yin pa de dag ni de la gzung ba'i rnam pa nyid du snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba la yod pa'i shes pa la yod pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gang yin pa de dag ni de la gzung ba'i rnam pa nyid du snang ba ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The apprehended object and apprehending subject that exist in the consciousness that experiences it do not appear in it as the aspect of the apprehended object.

original: rnam par 'byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par 'grel pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par 'byed pa ma yin zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par 'grel pa ni /
translated: It is not a differentiation means that the commentary explains this as follows:

original: yul gyi rnam pa can gyi shes pa la snang ba can tha dad par 'dzin pa ma yin te zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa can gyi shes pa la snang ba can tha dad par 'dzin pa ma yin te zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: It does not apprehend the appearance in the consciousness that has the aspect of the object as being different.

original: yul gyi rnam pa can nyams su myong ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba de ltar snang ba gang la yod pa de la skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa can nyams su myong ba'i shes pa zhes bya ba de ltar snang ba gang la yod pa de la skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which appears as the cognition called ‚Äúexperience of the form of the object‚Äù is said to be ‚Äúendowed with appearance.‚Äù

original: tha dad par zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las tha dad par ro //
analyzed: tha dad par zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa las tha dad par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúDistinctly‚Äù means distinct from the form of the apprehender.

original: 'di ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa de tsam 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa de tsam 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is only the form of the apprehender, and it is characterized by the apprehension of that alone.

original: de nyid ni rang nyid snang ba'i @229b ngo bo gcig pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de nyid ni rang nyid snang ba'i @229b ngo bo gcig pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The reason is stated: ‚Äúbecause it has the same nature as the appearance of itself.‚Äù

original: don gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam pa yongs su gcod pa ste /
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni don gyi rnam pa yongs su gcod pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe apprehension of the form of the object‚Äù means the determination of the form of the object.

original: blo gnyis pa ni don gyi rnam pa yongs su gcod pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: blo gnyis pa ni don gyi rnam pa yongs su gcod pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that the second cognition is endowed with the determination of the form of the object.

original: yang na don gyi rnam pa'i 'dzin pa ni don gyi rnam par 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: yang na don gyi rnam pa'i 'dzin pa ni don gyi rnam par 'dzin pa ste /
translated: Alternatively, the apprehension of the form of the object is the apprehension in the form of the object.

original: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba'i shes pa yin no //
translated: It is the cognition of experience.

original: de nyid ni 'brel zhing ldan pa ste gzung ba'i rnam pa yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni 'brel zhing ldan pa ste gzung ba'i rnam pa yin te /
translated: That is the connection, the possession, the aspect of the object.

original: 'brel zhing yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel zhing yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it connects, it joins with the object.

original: blo gang la de yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: blo gang la de yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That is what it is called when it exists in the cognition.

original: yul gyi rnam pas bsgyur ba'i nyams su myong ba'i shes pa shes pa'i shes pa la gzung ba'i rnam pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pas bsgyur ba'i nyams su myong ba'i shes pa shes pa'i shes pa la gzung ba'i rnam pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition of cognition, which is the experience transformed by the aspect of the object, appears as the aspect of the object.

original: dus phyis 'byung ba can gyi shes pa la sogs pa dang ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can shes pa gsum pa la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dus phyis 'byung ba can gyi shes pa la sogs pa dang ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i shes pa 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can shes pa gsum pa la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not the cognition that arises later, etc. The cognition of cognition has the nature of apprehending, i.e., the third cognition, etc.

original: rang dang 'brel pa can de dang sbyor bar byed kyi zhes bya ba ni don rgyu rgyur pa dang ngo //
analyzed: rang dang 'brel pa can de dang sbyor bar byed kyi zhes bya ba ni don rgyu rgyur pa dang ngo //
translated: It connects with that which is related to itself.

original: yul dang shes pa'i rnam pa yang zhes bya ba ni yul gyi rnam pa dang shes pa'i rnam pa dag ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: yul dang shes pa'i rnam pa yang zhes bya ba ni yul gyi rnam pa dang shes pa'i rnam pa dag ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The aspect of the object and the aspect of the cognition. The aspect of the object and the aspect of the cognition.

original: sbyor ba yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gcig tu nges par dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ni don ci 'dra ba ji ltar ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid la sogs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar kho bo
analyzed: sbyor ba yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gcig tu nges par dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs 'di ni don ci 'dra ba ji ltar ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa nyid la sogs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar kho bo
translated: ‚ÄúThe application‚Äù is as follows. The reason, ‚Äúbecause of the ascertainment of singularity,‚Äù is not established, contradictory, or indefinite in the sense of being like what?üîΩ

original: cag gis sngar bstan pa de ltar na yang ma bshad do //
analyzed: cag gis sngar bstan pa de ltar na yang ma bshad do //
translated: As for the syllogism, etc., we have not explained it as it should be explained, so that this reason, ‚Äúbecause of the definite perception of one,‚Äù will not be unestablished, contradictory, or indefinite, etc.

original: bstan bcos mdzad pas kyang rab tu byed pa gzhan du khyab pa bstan pas na /
analyzed: bstan bcos mdzad pas kyang rab tu byed pa gzhan du khyab pa bstan pas na /
translated: The author of the treatise, in another chapter, has taught the pervasion,

original: de ni khyab pa yang tshad ma rnam par nges pa las zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de ni khyab pa yang tshad ma rnam par nges pa las zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: so he says, ‚ÄúThe pervasion is taught in PramƒÅ·πáavini≈õcaya.‚Äù

original: don du snang ba can gyi blo med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pas stong pa'i sa phyogs su zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: don du snang ba can gyi blo med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni sngon po la sogs pas stong pa'i sa phyogs su zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause there is no cognition that appears as an object‚Äù means that it is the place devoid of blue, etc.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i don snang ba can mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de'i skye ba gang yin pa de'i bag chags yongs su smin pa ste /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i don snang ba can mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de'i skye ba gang yin pa de'i bag chags yongs su smin pa ste /
translated: The arising of that eye consciousness, etc., which is the appearance of the desired object, is the maturation of the latent potentialities.

original: 'bras bu skye ba la nus pa yod pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu skye ba la nus pa yod pa'o //
translated: and the capacity to produce the effect.

original: thams cad la drug pa'i bsdu ba bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad la drug pa'i bsdu ba bya'o //
translated: The inclusion of all in the six should be understood.

original: yongs su smin pa de nyid snying po ste /
analyzed: yongs su smin pa de nyid snying po ste /
translated: That very ripening is the essence.

original: nang gi sa bon yid la byed pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi sa bon yid la byed pa gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which has the mental attention of the inner seed is so called.

original: de nas yid la byed pa'i sgra dang las 'dzin pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas yid la byed pa'i sgra dang las 'dzin pa bya'o //
translated: Then the sound of mental attention and the action of grasping should be taken.

original: bye brag med par zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i rgyu gang yang rung ba yod do //üîΩde lta ma yin na ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi rgyu bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs la the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa @230a * //
analyzed: bye brag med par zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa las tha dad pa'i rgyu gang yang rung ba yod do // de lta ma yin na ma grub pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi rgyu bsgrub par bya ba la gtan tshigs la the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa @230a * //
translated: Without distinction means that there is some cause that is different from the eye, etc.üîΩOtherwise, it would be called unestablished, which is an inconclusive reason for establishing an external cause.

original: yin no // gal te yang gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi don med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan gyi bsam pa'i dogs pa bsu ba yin te /
analyzed: yin no // gal te yang gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi don med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhan gyi bsam pa'i dogs pa bsu ba yin te /
translated: If, however, there is no external object, etc., it is a response to the doubt of another,

original: rnam par shes pa dmigs pa med par smra ba'i sa bon dang myu gu don dam par yod pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sa bon dang myu gur snang ba'i blo'i gzung ba'i rnam pa las sa bon dang myu gu rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dmigs pa med par smra ba'i sa bon dang myu gu don dam par yod pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sa bon dang myu gur snang ba'i blo'i gzung ba'i rnam pa las sa bon dang myu gu rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: The seed and sprout of the consciousness that speaks of the non-apprehension of objects do not exist ultimately. However, the seed and sprout are posited from the apprehended aspects of the cognition that appears as seed and sprout.

original: blo'i gzung ba'i rnam pa yang de kho na nyid du yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: blo'i gzung ba'i rnam pa yang de kho na nyid du yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The apprehended aspects of cognition also do not exist in reality.

original: de nyid ni blo sa bon las myu gur snang ba 'khrul pa nyid yin pas na med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes smos te /
analyzed: de nyid ni blo sa bon las myu gur snang ba 'khrul pa nyid yin pas na med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes smos te /
translated: That itself is the delusion of the cognition appearing as a sprout from a seed. Therefore, it is said to be non-existent.

original: blo'i sa bon dang myu gur snang ba gang yin pa de 'khrul pa nyid yin pas na med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: blo'i sa bon dang myu gur snang ba gang yin pa de 'khrul pa nyid yin pas na med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that whatever appears as a seed and sprout in cognition is delusion itself and therefore non-existent.

original: de ci ltar sa bon las myu gu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la myu gu skye ba zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'i rnam par gzhag pa de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can de ci ltar zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de ci ltar sa bon las myu gu zhes bya ba la sogs pa la myu gu skye ba zhes bya ba ni byed pa po'i rnam par gzhag pa de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can de ci ltar zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: How is it that from a seed a sprout arises, and so on? The arising of a sprout is posited as the agent. How is it that such a characteristic exists? It is connected in this way.

original: gal te de ci ltar na mi 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ci ltar na mi 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how could that be?

original: sa bon dang myu gur snang ba dag la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sa bon dang myu gur snang ba dag la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn the appearances of seeds and sprouts,‚Äù and so on.

original: sa bon du snang ba rgyu ma yin zhing myu gur snang ba 'bras bu ma yin te de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa bon du snang ba rgyu ma yin zhing myu gur snang ba 'bras bu ma yin te de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The appearance of a seed is not the cause, and the appearance of a sprout is not the effect, because they do not exist.üîΩWhen smoke is realized, the fire that exists is not the fire that is the sign.

original: du ba rtogs pa'i dus na me yod pa de ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni rtags su gyur pa'i du ba snang ba'i dus na shes bya nang gi yin par smra ba'i du bar snang ba'i blo du ba yin la /
analyzed: du ba rtogs pa'i dus na me yod pa de ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni rtags su gyur pa'i du ba snang ba'i dus na shes bya nang gi yin par smra ba'i du bar snang ba'i blo du ba yin la /
translated: When the smoke that is the sign appears, the cognition that appears as smoke is smoke for the Proponents of Objects as Mental States.

original: de nyid skye bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas skabs na phyi rol gyi me yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid skye bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas skabs na phyi rol gyi me yod pa ma yin te /
translated: At the time of its arising, the external fire that exists is not the fire that is the sign.

original: de khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because they do not assert that.

original: de'i tshe mer snang ba'i blo yang myong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe mer snang ba'i blo yang myong ba ma yin te /
translated: At that time, the cognition that appears as fire is not an experience.

original: de ni phyis 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni phyis 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it has the character of arising later.

original: dngos po rtogs pa la brten nas zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi dngos po med na yang dngos por snang ba'i blo dngos por rtogs pa yin zhing de la brten nas so //
analyzed: dngos po rtogs pa la brten nas zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi dngos po med na yang dngos por snang ba'i blo dngos por rtogs pa yin zhing de la brten nas so //
translated: Based on the realization of entities means that even though external entities do not exist, the mind that appears as entities is the realization of entities, and based on that.

original: de nyid ni tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid ni tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa'i sgo nas bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach just that through an explanation of the verse,

original: de'i ngo bor zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
