original: dper gyur pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i byed pa po'i skyes bu'i tshig la don dam @260b pa'i skyes bu med pas khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dper gyur pa'i sgrub par byed pa'i byed pa po'i skyes bu'i tshig la don dam @260b pa'i skyes bu med pas khyab pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: For example, the words of a person who is the agent of a figurative proof do not necessarily refer to a real person.

original: rtag pa ni tshig gi rgyu nyid yin pa mi rung ba'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa'i skyes bu'i tshig srid pa ma yin pa de ltar na khyab pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa ni tshig gi rgyu nyid yin pa mi rung ba'i phyir de lta bur gyur pa'i skyes bu'i tshig srid pa ma yin pa de ltar na khyab pa yod pa yin no //
translated: It is not possible for a permanent thing to be the cause of words, so the words of such a person are not possible. Thus, the pervasion is established.

original: sems dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'dod pa la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems dang ldan par rtogs par 'gyur ba lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'dod pa la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For example, it is understood that the words of a sentient being are not contradicted in what they intend to express.

original: da ltar dang 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dus 'di dang yul 'dir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: da ltar dang 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dus 'di dang yul 'dir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: As for ‚Äúnow‚Äù and ‚Äúhere,‚Äù etc., it means ‚Äúat this time‚Äù and ‚Äúin this place.‚Äù

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i yul dang dus nges pa'i me dang / gzhan na yod pa'i du ba'i 'brel pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i yul dang dus nges pa'i me dang / gzhan na yod pa'i du ba'i 'brel pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not possible for there to be a connection between fire and smoke that are restricted to such a place and time, and fire that exists elsewhere.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i me dang 'brel pa med na yang sgrub par byed do zhes bshad pa na yang shugs kyis me grub pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni me tsam sgrub par 'dod pa la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i me dang 'brel pa med na yang sgrub par byed do zhes bshad pa na yang shugs kyis me grub pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni me tsam sgrub par 'dod pa la gnod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not related to fire in that way, then even if it were said that it establishes, it would be as if fire were established by implication. This is because there is no harm in asserting the mere establishment of fire.

original: yul la sogs pa'i nges pa'i 'ga' zhig khyab par byed pa ma yin zhing phyis 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can yul la sogs pa'i khyad par dang 'brel pa yin no zhes sngar bshad zin to //
analyzed: yul la sogs pa'i nges pa'i 'ga' zhig khyab par byed pa ma yin zhing phyis 'byung ba'i ngang tshul can yul la sogs pa'i khyad par dang 'brel pa yin no zhes sngar bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that some certainty about the object and so on is not pervasion, and that it is related to the particular object and so on that occurs later.

original: gal te dngos su bstan bcos kyi skyon gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi yin te /
analyzed: gal te dngos su bstan bcos kyi skyon gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi yin te /
translated: If it is said, In reality, the treatise is faulty, and so on, this is the opponent's view.

original: dngos su de gnod pa can gyi gtan tshigs yin no zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: dngos su de gnod pa can gyi gtan tshigs yin no zhes sbyar ro //
translated: It should be connected with In reality, it is a faulty reason.

original: des byas ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni rgol bas so //
analyzed: des byas ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni rgol bas so //
translated: Not produced by it refers to the opponent.

original: 'brel pa med pa ma grub pa'am zhes bya ba ni dgag pas mtshams sbyar du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa ma grub pa'am zhes bya ba ni dgag pas mtshams sbyar du byas pa yin no //
translated: Not established as unrelated is connected by the negation.

original: gal te de ltar nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi yin no //
analyzed: gal te de ltar nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi yin no //
translated: If it is so, then the qualities of space, etc. are the other's.

original: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni chos can sgra la'o //
analyzed: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni chos can sgra la'o //
translated: In that very thing means in the subject, sound.

original: mnyan par bya ba nyid la sogs pas rtag pa nyid la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba ni sgra rtag pa yin te mnyan par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir sgra nyid bzhin no /
analyzed: mnyan par bya ba nyid la sogs pas rtag pa nyid la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa zhes bya ba ni sgra rtag pa yin te mnyan par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir sgra nyid bzhin no /
translated: The proof of permanence, etc. by audibility, etc. is as follows: Sound is permanent because of audibility, like sound itself.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni nges par bsal bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni nges par bsal bar bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The word etc. includes because of being necessarily perceptible, etc.

original: de grub pa na yang zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: de grub pa na yang zhes bya ba ni rtag pa nyid do //
translated: And when that is established, means when permanence is established.

original: de ni ma yin te 'ga' pa nges pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dang de la skyon gyi rigs yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te 'ga' pa nges pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de dang de la skyon gyi rigs yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: That is not so, because of the certainty of some, etc. The meaning is that the type of fallacy does not exist in that and that.

original: gang gi phyir 'gal bar nges pa ni gnod pa byed pa ma yin pa de ltar na nam mkha'i yon tan nyid med par grub pa yin na yang mi rtag pa nyid la gnod pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gal bar nges pa ni gnod pa byed pa ma yin pa de ltar na nam mkha'i yon tan nyid med par grub pa yin na yang mi rtag pa nyid la gnod pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the certainty of contradiction is not a fault, in that way, although the quality of space is established as non-existent, impermanence is not faulted.

original: de nyid ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed do //üîΩde dag skabs su bab pa dang skabs su bab pa ma yin pa dag ces @261a * //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul ba can zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed do // de dag skabs su bab pa dang skabs su bab pa ma yin pa dag ces @261a * //
translated: That very thing is explained by ‚Äúthe non-erroneous contradiction,‚Äù and so on.

original: bya ba la sogs pa gzhan gyi bsam pa'i dogs pa bsu ba yin no //
analyzed: bya ba la sogs pa gzhan gyi bsam pa'i dogs pa bsu ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThose that are relevant and irrelevant,‚Äù and so on, is the anticipation of another‚Äôs doubt.

original: 'brel med la zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par 'grel ba ni skabs ma yin pa med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'brel med la zhes bya ba 'di'i rnam par 'grel ba ni skabs ma yin pa med na mi 'byung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe irrelevant,‚Äù and so on, is the commentary on this. ‚ÄúThe non-relevant is not a necessary condition‚Äù is the explanation.

original: gal te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid skabs su bab par 'gyur ba'am brjod par 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba de med na mi 'byung ba yin pa de'i tshe nam mkha'i yon tan nyid skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang 'brel par 'gyur na de
analyzed: gal te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid skabs su bab par 'gyur ba'am brjod par 'dod pa'i bsgrub par bya ba de med na mi 'byung ba yin pa de'i tshe nam mkha'i yon tan nyid skabs su bab pa'i bsgrub par bya ba'i chos dang 'brel par 'gyur na de
translated: If the quality of space were the reason, then the probandum would be the quality of space, and the probandum would not occur if the quality of space did not exist.

original: yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But that is not the case.

original: gal te gnod par bya ba nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su 'dod pa dang 'brel pa yod pa yin na ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'dod pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gnod par bya ba nam mkha'i yon tan nyid bsgrub par bya ba'i chos su 'dod pa dang 'brel pa yod pa yin na ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa 'dod pa la yang gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If the probandum were the quality of space, which is to be refuted, then impermanence and so on would also be refuted.

original: de'i tshe bstan bcos bslad par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub ba'i mtha' smra ba'i yin no //üîΩgal te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe bstan bcos bslad par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni grub ba'i mtha' smra ba'i yin no // gal te nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi yin te /
translated: At that time, the treatise would be corrupted.

original: shin tu thal ches pa'i skyon 'di min no //
analyzed: shin tu thal ches pa'i skyon 'di min no //
translated: If the quality of space and so on were the probandum, then this would be an extreme overextension of the argument.

original: gang gi phyir nam mkha'i yon tan la sogs pa de sgra nyid dang 'brel pa yod de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nam mkha'i yon tan la sogs pa de sgra nyid dang 'brel pa yod de /
translated: Why? Because the quality of space and so on are related to sound itself.

original: sgra ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir sgra chos can mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i skabs yin ba de'i phyir chos can gyi skabs nyid yin pa de dang 'brel ba nam mkha'i yon tan 'di dang skabs su bab pa nyid yin
analyzed: sgra ni nam mkha'i yon tan nyid du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir sgra chos can mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub pa'i skabs yin ba de'i phyir chos can gyi skabs nyid yin pa de dang 'brel ba nam mkha'i yon tan 'di dang skabs su bab pa nyid yin
translated: Sound is asserted to be the quality of space itself. Therefore, since this is the context of the subject, the quality of space related to it is also the context.

original: gyi chos can dri la sgra'i 'brel pa yod pa ma yin na gang gis na sgra skabs su bab par 'gyur /
analyzed: gyi chos can dri la sgra'i 'brel pa yod pa ma yin na gang gis na sgra skabs su bab par 'gyur /
translated: But if the subject, smell, is not related to sound, then why is sound the context?

original: rgyu des de nyid la ste sgra la nam mkha'i yon tan nyid gnod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu des de nyid la ste sgra la nam mkha'i yon tan nyid gnod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that very sound is undermined as the quality of space by that reason.üîΩIf being produced were not the reason, then smell and so on would not be the quality of earth.

original: byas pa nyid gtan tshigs nyid ma yin na gzhan dri la sogs pa la sa'i yon tan nyid bzlog pa'i phyir ma yin no zhe na de bden pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan yin no //
analyzed: byas pa nyid gtan tshigs nyid ma yin na gzhan dri la sogs pa la sa'i yon tan nyid bzlog pa'i phyir ma yin no zhe na de bden pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni lan yin no //
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThat is not true‚Äù and so on.

original: de dang gzhan zhes bya ba ni rgol bas 'dod pa mi rtag ba nyid la sogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba rigs pa dang ldan ba gang yin pa dang / gzhan nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa bstan bcos las khas blangs pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba khyod kyi rigs pa 'dis thob pa gang yin pa de thams cad rang gi bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing /
analyzed: de dang gzhan zhes bya ba ni rgol bas 'dod pa mi rtag ba nyid la sogs pa'i bsgrub par bya ba rigs pa dang ldan ba gang yin pa dang / gzhan nam mkha'i yon tan nyid la sogs pa bstan bcos las khas blangs pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba khyod kyi rigs pa 'dis thob pa gang yin pa de thams cad rang gi bsgrub par bya ba yin zhing /
translated: ‚ÄúThat and other‚Äù means that all of the things that are established by your reasoning, such as impermanence, which is asserted by the opponent, and the other, such as the quality of space, which is accepted in the treatise, are all established by your reasoning.

original: de bzhin du dri la yang sa'i yon tan nyid bstan bcos las khas blangs pa nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du dri la yang sa'i yon tan nyid bstan bcos las khas blangs pa nyid kyi phyir bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: And in the same way, smell is also established because the quality of earth is accepted in the treatise.

original: de nyid ni bstan bcos las khas blangs sa'i phyir der grags pa thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin pa zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de nyid ni bstan bcos las khas blangs sa'i phyir der grags pa thams cad bsgrub par bya ba yin pa zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says that because it is accepted in the treatise, all that is renowned in that treatise is established.

original: bsgrub bya la zhes bya ba ni bdun pa bsgrub par bya @261b ba'i chos kyi zhes drug pa bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya la zhes bya ba ni bdun pa bsgrub par bya @261b ba'i chos kyi zhes drug pa bshad par bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúWith respect to the object of affirmation‚Äù means that the sixth case, ‚Äúwith respect to,‚Äù should be explained as ‚Äúwith respect to the object of affirmation,‚Äù which is the seventh case.

original: ldan pa dang rnam par phye ba dang 'phrod pa 'du ba'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni ldan pa dang rnam par phye ba dag gis sgra grub pa'i phyir sgra ni ldan pa'i rgyu nyid dang rnam par phye ba'i rgyu nyid yin
analyzed: ldan pa dang rnam par phye ba dang 'phrod pa 'du ba'i rgyu ma yin pa nyid la sogs pa'i zhes bya ba ni ldan pa dang rnam par phye ba dag gis sgra grub pa'i phyir sgra ni ldan pa'i rgyu nyid dang rnam par phye ba'i rgyu nyid yin
translated: The words ‚Äúnot a cause of inherence, etc.‚Äù are added because sound is established as a cause of inherence and a cause of separation.

original: gyi sgra ni gzhan 'phrod pa 'du ba'i rgyu ma yin ba de ltar na sgra'i 'phrod pa 'du ba'i rgyu nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: gyi sgra ni gzhan 'phrod pa 'du ba'i rgyu ma yin ba de ltar na sgra'i 'phrod pa 'du ba'i rgyu nyid ma yin no //
translated: Sound is a cause of inherence and a cause of separation, but sound is not a cause of the inherence of something else. Thus, sound is not a cause of the inherence of sound.

original: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig mdzad cing gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni tshad ma kun las btus par ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba nyid du 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i tshig mdzad cing gzhan du yang zhes bya ba ni tshad ma kun las btus par ro //
translated: The words ‚Äúthat which is to be established‚Äù are added because the author of the NyƒÅyamukha also says elsewhere in the NyƒÅyaprave≈õa:üîΩ‚ÄúThat which is to be established is the thesis.‚Äù

original: gang zhig des rnam par gzhag pa tsam la gus par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid byed pa'i tshig la'o //
analyzed: gang zhig des rnam par gzhag pa tsam la gus par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid byed pa'i tshig la'o //
translated: The words ‚Äúone should not pay respect to the mere establishment by that‚Äù refer to the words of the definition.

original: de ltar 'chad pa po bdag nyid 'dod pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'chad pa po bdag nyid 'dod pa kho na bsgrub par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the author himself would be establishing only what he himself wishes to establish.üîΩThe definition of a thesis is:

original: phyogs mtshan phyi rol don can gyi //
analyzed: phyogs mtshan phyi rol don can gyi //
translated: A thesis is a statement of a subject that possesses a property to be established.

original: zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid phyi rol gyi don gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid phyi rol gyi don gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: This is the definition of a position, which is an external object.

original: gal te bdag nyid kyi sgras bstan bcos byed pa 'dod pa 'gog par byed pa de'i tshe rgol ba nyid kyis 'dod pa bdag nyid kyi sgras phyogs nyid du ston par byed cing phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi nang du 'dus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te bdag nyid kyi sgras bstan bcos byed pa 'dod pa 'gog par byed pa de'i tshe rgol ba nyid kyis 'dod pa bdag nyid kyi sgras phyogs nyid du ston par byed cing phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi nang du 'dus par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the word ‚Äúitself‚Äù is intended to refute the author of the treatise, then the opponent himself would be indicating the position by the word ‚Äúitself,‚Äù and it would be included within the definition of a position.

original: de ltar khas mi len na ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid phyi rol gyi don can bdag nyid kyi sgrar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar khas mi len na ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid phyi rol gyi don can bdag nyid kyi sgrar 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does not accept this, then the definition of a position would be an external object.

original: de ltar na 'di don gyi khyad par gzhan yin par dogs pa de la gzhan nyid yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di don gyi khyad par gzhan yin par dogs pa de la gzhan nyid yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Thus, fearing that this is a different particular object, he says ‚Äúit is not different,‚Äù and so on.

original: mtshan nyid la 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni gang rnam par gcod pa'i phyir bdag nyid smos pa mdzad pa'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid pa 'khrul pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: mtshan nyid la 'khrul pa zhes bya ba ni gang rnam par gcod pa'i phyir bdag nyid smos pa mdzad pa'i phyir phyogs kyi mtshan nyid pa 'khrul pa yod pa yin no //
translated: As for the error in the definition, since the word ‚Äúitself‚Äù is used to exclude, there is an error in the definition of a position.

original: tshad ma kun las btus pa'i t'i k'a byed pas bdag nyid kyi sgra don gzhan du rtogs pa byas pa la /
analyzed: tshad ma kun las btus pa'i t'i k'a byed pas bdag nyid kyi sgra don gzhan du rtogs pa byas pa la /
translated: The author of the Tattva·π≠ƒ´kƒÅ, having understood the meaning of the word ‚Äúself‚Äù in a different way, refutes it by raising the objection, ‚ÄúWhatever treatise was previously accepted . . .‚ÄùüîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the purpose of excluding the other two kinds of objects of refutation.üîΩThe word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the purpose of excluding the other two kinds of objects of refutation.

original: bstan bcos cung zad sngar khas blangs ba gang yin pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'phangs nas sun 'byin par byed do //üîΩrang 'dod brtags pa'i khyad par can //
analyzed: bstan bcos cung zad sngar khas blangs ba gang yin pa de zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'phangs nas sun 'byin par byed do // rang 'dod brtags pa'i khyad par can //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the purpose of excluding the other two kinds of objects of refutation.

original: de yang le'u dang por dpyad zin to //üîΩchos can la dpe @262a * //
analyzed: de yang le'u dang por dpyad zin to // chos can la dpe @262a * //
translated: This has already been analyzed in the first chapter.üîΩBecause there is no example for the subject.

original: med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dpe yon tan dang ldan pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni dpe yon tan dang ldan pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The subject is not endowed with the qualities of an example.

original: ci'i phyir chos can la dpe med pa'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir chos can la dpe med pa'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is there no example for the subject?

original: chos can chos can gzhan la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can chos can gzhan la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The subject does not exist in another subject.

original: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa yan lag phyi ma la ltos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa yan lag phyi ma la ltos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa yongs su gzung ngo //
translated: The later parts, such as the property of the subject, depend on the other, and so on. The word ‚Äúand so on‚Äù includes pervasion and contraposition.

original: ma grub pa nyid la sogs pa'i skyon te zhes bya ba 'di la yang sogs pa'i sgras ni 'gal ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid la sogs pa'i skyon te zhes bya ba 'di la yang sogs pa'i sgras ni 'gal ba la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The faults such as non-establishment, and so on. The word ‚Äúand so on‚Äù includes contradiction, and so on.

original: gtan tshigs dang dpe'i zhes bya ba la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ni gcig yin te phyogs kyi chos tsam la gtan tshigs nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe'i zhes bya ba la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid ni gcig yin te phyogs kyi chos tsam la gtan tshigs nye bar btags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reason and example are as follows: The definition of a reason is one, because a reason is merely figuratively designated to the property of the subject.

original: dpe ni chos mthun pa nyid can gyi bye brag gis dang chos mi mthun pa nyid can gyi bye brag gis mtshan nyid gnyis yin no //
analyzed: dpe ni chos mthun pa nyid can gyi bye brag gis dang chos mi mthun pa nyid can gyi bye brag gis mtshan nyid gnyis yin no //
translated: The definition of an example is two, by the distinction of having the same property and by the distinction of having a different property.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rgyu sogs mtshan nyid kyis zhes mdor mang po'i tshig tu byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rgyu sogs mtshan nyid kyis zhes mdor mang po'i tshig tu byas pa yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the words by the definition of cause, etc. are made in the plural.

original: mtshan nyid la //
analyzed: mtshan nyid la //
translated: With regard to the definition,

original: byas pa med pa ldog pa dag / spangs pa'i don du'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: byas pa med pa ldog pa dag / spangs pa'i don du'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: the non-existence of the produced and the reversal are for the sake of abandoning the object.

original: phyogs de la khyab pa med pa ni khyab pa yod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: phyogs de la khyab pa med pa ni khyab pa yod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Non-pervasion of that position is not having pervasion.

original: ldog pa ni shin tu khyab pa ste de dag spangs pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: ldog pa ni shin tu khyab pa ste de dag spangs pa'i don du'o //
translated: Reversal is complete pervasion. They are for the sake of abandoning those.

original: gtan tshigs dang dpe'i mtshan nyid kyis spang bar bya ba'i skyon la ltos pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs dang dpe dag gi mtshan nyid kyis spang bar bya ba'i skyon ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa la
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang dpe'i mtshan nyid kyis spang bar bya ba'i skyon la ltos pa zhes bya ba ni gtan tshigs dang dpe dag gi mtshan nyid kyis spang bar bya ba'i skyon ma grub pa dang 'gal ba dang ma nges pa dang rjes su 'gro ba med pa la
translated: The phrase in relation to the faults to be avoided by means of the characteristics of the reason and example refers to the faults to be avoided by means of the characteristics of the reason and example, namely, the unestablished, the contradictory, the indefinite, the non-concomitant, etc.

original: sogs pa gang yin pa de la ltos pa ste /
analyzed: sogs pa gang yin pa de la ltos pa ste /
translated: In relation to those, in relation to means in regard to.

original: de'i skyon yongs su spangs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i skyon yongs su spangs nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: having completely avoided those faults.

original: de'i tshe phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyis gtan tshigs la sogs pa mtshon pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yul mtshon pa med pas gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid yul med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyis gtan tshigs la sogs pa mtshon pa nyid yin pa'i phyir yul mtshon pa med pas gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid yul med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, since the reason, etc. are indicated by the characteristic of the position, there is no indication of the object, and so the characteristics of the reason, etc. would be objectless.

original: bdag nyid kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i cha yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni tshigs su bcad pa'i cha yin no //
translated: The phrase only in regard to oneself, etc. is a part of the verse.

original: bdag nyid kho na dang ngo bo ste de dag gi sgra zhes bya ba ni zlas dbye ba'i snying po can gyi de'i skyes bu'i khyad par gyi bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid kho na dang ngo bo ste de dag gi sgra zhes bya ba ni zlas dbye ba'i snying po can gyi de'i skyes bu'i khyad par gyi bsdu ba yin no //
translated: The words ‚Äúitself‚Äù and ‚Äúessence‚Äù are included in the compound ‚Äúthose‚Äù because they are the core of a disjunctive compound.

original: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni ngo bo gtso bor gyur ba brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni ngo bo gtso bor gyur ba brjod pa yin no //
translated: The words ‚Äúitself‚Äù and so on express the essence as the primary factor.

original: de bas na sgra ste mnyan pa'i rnam grangs dang gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: de bas na sgra ste mnyan pa'i rnam grangs dang gzhi mthun pa nyid du 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is tenable that the word ‚Äúsound‚Äù is a synonym for ‚Äúaudible‚Äù and that they share a common locus.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid ces bya ba'i sgra la sogs par zhes bya ba'i sgra sbyor bas rang gi ngo bor gtso bor gyur pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bdag nyid ces bya ba'i sgra la sogs par zhes bya ba'i sgra sbyor bas rang gi ngo bor gtso bor gyur pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: For that very reason, the word ‚Äúitself‚Äù and so on is connected with the word ‚Äúsound‚Äù in order to demonstrate that the essence is the primary factor.

original: kho na zhes bya ba ni tshig gi phrad do zhes bya ba la rang gi ngo bos @262b zhes bya ba la phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi kho na gang yin pa de tshig gi phrad yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: kho na zhes bya ba ni tshig gi phrad do zhes bya ba la rang gi ngo bos @262b zhes bya ba la phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi kho na gang yin pa de tshig gi phrad yin no zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is a particle. The meaning of ‚Äúonly‚Äù is the characteristic of a directional term. It is a particle.

original: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel bshad /
analyzed: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel bshad /
translated: Commentary on Valid Knowledge

original: bam po drug cu rtsa gnyis pa /
analyzed: bam po drug cu rtsa gnyis pa /
translated: Book 62

original: ngo bo dang rang gi ngo bo'i sgra dag ni don mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba'i sgra ngo bo'i sgrar bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo dang rang gi ngo bo'i sgra dag ni don mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba'i sgra ngo bo'i sgrar bstan pa yin no //
translated: The terms ‚Äúnature‚Äù and ‚Äúown nature‚Äù have the same meaning, so the term ‚Äúown nature‚Äù is explained as the term ‚Äúnature.‚Äù

original: mdo zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi mdo bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa bdag nyid kyi sgras bsal ba yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: mdo zhes bya ba ni phyogs kyi mtshan nyid kyi mdo bstan bcos byed pa'i 'dod pa bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa bdag nyid kyi sgras bsal ba yin no zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The term ‚Äús≈´tra‚Äù is explained as a s≈´tra that has the characteristic of a side, and it is connected with the explanation that the treatise-writer‚Äôs desire to establish something is itself excluded.

original: sgrub par byed pa yang de yin la ma grub pa yang yin pas na sgrub par byed pa ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yang de yin la ma grub pa yang yin pas na sgrub par byed pa ma grub pa'o //
translated: Since it is an establishment and it is not established, it is an unestablished establishment.

original: de brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa ste /
analyzed: de brjod pa ni bsgrub par bya ba nyid thob pa ste /
translated: The expression of that is the establishment itself,

original: kho nas bsal ba yin no zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: kho nas bsal ba yin no zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: and it is excluded by just that.

original: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should be applied in the same way to the others.

original: rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo'i tshig gis so //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos zhes bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo'i tshig gis so //
translated: ‚ÄúBy its own nature‚Äù is by the term ‚Äúown nature.‚Äù

original: rnam par phye nas mtshan nyid du byas pa bshad pa yin te /üîΩlog par rtogs pa rnams rang gi sgras bsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: rnam par phye nas mtshan nyid du byas pa bshad pa yin te / log par rtogs pa rnams rang gi sgras bsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is the explanation of the definition of the thesis as that which is to be established,üîΩbecause it is the object of the statement, and because it is the object of the statement of the reason, and because it is the object of the statement of the example, and because it is the object of the statement of the conclusion.

original: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba ni de tsam nyid don dam par phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub byar khas blangs zhes bya ba ni de tsam nyid don dam par phyogs kyi mtshan nyid yin te /
translated: The statement ‚Äúthat which is accepted as the probandum‚Äù means that just that is the definition of the thesis in the ultimate,

original: de tsam nyid kyis khyab pa med pa dang khyab ches pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de tsam nyid kyis khyab pa med pa dang khyab ches pa bzlog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because just that excludes over-pervasion and non-pervasion.

original: de nyid ni ci ltar zhes bya ba'i dri ba sngon du song bas ston par byed do //
analyzed: de nyid ni ci ltar zhes bya ba'i dri ba sngon du song bas ston par byed do //
translated: That very [definition] is taught by the question ‚Äúhow?‚Äù that precedes [the statement].

original: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa 'god pa'i du na'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe zhes bya ba ni sgrub par byed pa 'god pa'i du na'o //
translated: ‚ÄúAt that time‚Äù is the time of stating the proof.

original: de skad du khas len pa'i bya ba grub pa can gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs pa yin gyi ma 'ongs pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de skad du khas len pa'i bya ba grub pa can gtso bo nyid yin pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya bar khas blangs pa yin gyi ma 'ongs pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it is taught that the action of accepting is the probandum, because it is the principal, and not the future.

original: 'dod pa'i tshig gi don khas blangs pa'i sgras thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'dod pa dang khas blangs pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i tshig gi don khas blangs pa'i sgras thob pa yin no zhes bya ba'i 'dod pa dang khas blangs pa mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the desire and the assertion are the same in being obtained by the power of accepting the meaning of the words of the desire.

original: sgrub par 'os pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tshad mas bsal ba sgrub par byed par 'os pa'am /
analyzed: sgrub par 'os pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la tshad mas bsal ba sgrub par byed par 'os pa'am /
translated: As for ‚Äúworthy of proof,‚Äù etc., it is not suitable to prove that which is already established by a valid cognition,

original: sgrub par byed pa'i phyir nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i phyir nus pa ma yin no //
translated: because it is already established.

original: de nyid ni ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du //
analyzed: de nyid ni ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du //
translated: That is just as explained.

original: de rnams la ni phyogs nyid med //
analyzed: de rnams la ni phyogs nyid med //
translated: They do not have the nature of a position.

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo spel nas 'chad par byed do //üîΩbsgrub byar khas blangs phyogs mtshan nyid //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo spel nas 'chad par byed do // bsgrub byar khas blangs phyogs mtshan nyid //
translated: Thus he explains it by expanding on the sutra.

original: ces bya ba bshad pa na /
analyzed: ces bya ba bshad pa na /
translated: When he explains, ‚ÄúThe definition of a position is that which is to be proven,‚ÄùüîΩhe explains that the five terms ‚Äúown nature,‚Äù etc., are respectively used to indicate the established object,

original: rang gi ngo bo la sogs pa'i sgras bsal ba de dag la rnam par phye bas phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la rang gi ngo bo dang kho na dang bdag nyid dang 'dod pa dang ma bsal ba'i sgra lnga dag gis go rims bzhin du bstsal ba grub pa
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo la sogs pa'i sgras bsal ba de dag la rnam par phye bas phyogs kyi mtshan nyid la rang gi ngo bo dang kho na dang bdag nyid dang 'dod pa dang ma bsal ba'i sgra lnga dag gis go rims bzhin du bstsal ba grub pa
translated: because they distinguish that which is to be proven from those that are not.

original: la sogs pa lnga ste /
analyzed: la sogs pa lnga ste /
translated: and so on, there are five.

original: bsgrub pa dang sgrub par byed pa ma @263a * //
analyzed: bsgrub pa dang sgrub par byed pa ma @263a * //
